title: Will SKT skins come back at worlds or will this be the last time we see them?
body: I want to get skt t1 azir but it wouldnt let me buy the skin so i am wondering if the skin will come back after worlds

replies.body: it was the last years so I think we will get the Team skins again

I'm not 100% certain at this moment, but typically those skins do become available again around the time of World's and such. I'd say there's a pretty decent chance of SKT Azir being back in the shop around then, but I can't make any promises. 

Side Note! Those types of [**legacy skins**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944) are always available from Hextech crafting as well, so fingers crossed for you!
